content.text:
# Jatusana Block of Rewari

Jatusana block is a tehsil in Rewari district, Haryana, India. It consists of 65 Gram Panchayats and 73 villages.
Ruby Rajkumar Yadav
Chairman Block Simiti Jatusana resident of
Qutubpuri Bujurg
